revised_title: Symmetry Considerations in the Agmon Spectral Function for Molecular Hamiltonians
tldr: The authors introduce the Agmon spectral function with symmetry considerations for molecular Hamiltonians. They show that this function is symmetric for an n-body Schrodinger operator restricted to a subspace of prescribed symmetry and demonstrate how it can be used to obtain criteria for the finiteness and infiniteness of bound states of polyatomic systems.
